title: Drawing, "Studies from the Rio Magdalena, Colombia:  Tree Tops, Flying White Bird, Vines, and Three Flowering Plants", 1853, probably May
markings:
Watermark:  Impressed: caduceus flanked by E and B in a shield.
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper center:  white bird; again, at center:  vines vine stems everywhere; and at lower center:  water plant
description: Horizontal view of tree tops, a flying white bird, vines and across the bottom three flowering plants, one identified as a water plant.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Studies from the Rio Magdalena, Colombia:  Tree Tops, Flying White Bird, Vines, and Three Flowering Plants", 1853, probably May.
1853, probably May. Graphite on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-848-a.
